lead_paragraph: Alinghi of Switzerland, the America's Cup holder, and Emirates Team New Zealand each won two races yesterday to share the lead with 6 points after the third day of Act 12 of the Louis Vuitton Cup in Valencia, Spain. Alinghi defeated BMW Oracle of the United States and China Team. New Zealand defeated Italy's Luna Rossa of Italy and Areva Challenge of France.
